Address: 5818 EL CAMINO REAL, CARLSBAD, California, 92008, United States of America
CompanyDescription: We are a medical technology company focused on the design, development, and advancement of technology for better surgical treatment of spinal disorders. Through our wholly-owned subsidiaries, Alphatec Spine, Inc. and SafeOp Surgical, Inc., our mission is to revolutionize the approach to spine surgery through clinical distinction. Our approach-based spine surgery products and solutions integrate seamlessly with our SafeOp Neural InformatiXTM System to provide real-time, objective nerve information that can enhance the safety and reproducibility of spine surgery. We have a broad product portfolio designed to address the majority of spinal disorders. We have driven growth by exploiting our collective spine experience and investing in research and development to continually differentiate our solutions and improve spine surgery.  ... More ...
